Title: The Cap Table
Writer: Carson Mell, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Matteo Borghese (staff writer), Rob Turbovsky (staff writer), Jessica Gao (staff writer), Carson Mell (story editor)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: Richard hires Jared to design a business plan. Big Head is asked to work for Gavin Belson, where he discovers that Hooli has stolen the Pied Piper algorithm and calls it Nucleus. Meanwhile Richard struggles to get his money from Gregory.
